pages.text: The most basic chimney can be crafted from six pieces of cobblestone, but technically you can build a home with open air above your pollution sources which will also work.

You should build your shelters with several block high ceilings in the 3 x 3 space surrounding your pollution sources to avoid accumulation of toxic gases at ground level, with chimneys or other open air blocks above providing a way for the gases to escape.  One chimney will likely be insufficient until more advanced systems can be constructed.
